thread.title: BRIEF-Minerva Neurosciences Reports Fiscal 2017 Fourth Quarter And Year End Financial Results

title: BRIEF-Minerva Neurosciences Reports Fiscal 2017 Fourth Quarter And Year End Financial Results
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:46 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Minerva Neurosciences Reports Fiscal 2017 Fourth Quarter And Year End Financial Results Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Minerva Neurosciences Inc: * MINERVA NEUROSCIENCES REPORTS FISCAL 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR END FINANCIAL RESULTS AND BUSINESS UPDATES * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.38 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * MINERVA NEUROSCIENCES - SEES EXISTING CASH & CASH EQUIVALENTS WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO MEET ANTICIPATED CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS FOR AT LEAST NEXT 12 MONTHS * MINERVA NEUROSCIENCES - CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND MARKETABLE SECURITIES AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 WERE ABOUT $133.2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
